column4: Hello everyone. I have some kind of emergency problem here. I cannot get to my boot manager, i always get grub error 17. it seems that my partition is corrupted. can somebody help me here ?
isnt there some way to recue it ?
i mean is it defintelz corrupted ?
There is a way to rescue it. Try Googleing for that error...I don't know off the top of my head how to solve it
